title: 41 in. Pro-Lite Floral Shovel
description: It wasn't too long after we got into the business of making tools that older women began asking us for a floral shovel. For some women it was because they had long-ago used a small headed shovel and remembered it as their favorite garden tool. For others, there is a great value in a smaller shovel head that requires less lifting strength, is easier to dig with and is simply more compact than a traditional round pt. so, we designed what we think is the best little shovel you can buy. Apparently, so did our customers because it has become an instant hit.
